program.name: libungif

item.para: Apply patch for CVE-2005-2974 (http://www.cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2005-2974). A null-pointer dereference could cause a denial-of-service attach.
Apply patch for CVE-2005-3350 (http://www.cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2005-3350). An out-of-bounds memory access could cause a denial-of-service or execution of arbitrary code.
Add support for AIX 5.1 (same as AIX 4)
